=== Vim Wiki Notes ===
= Typefaces =
- \*bold text\*
	*bold*
- \_italic text\_
	_italic_
- these can be combined
	_*bold and italic*_
- backticks for code 
	`code (no syntax)`
- some additional words are highlighted flashy (TODO, DONE, STARTED, FIXME, etc. [see g:vimwiki-option-rx_todo])
- \[\[wiki link]]\]
	[[wiki link]]
- \[\[link|with description\]\]
	[[vimwiki|with description]]
- diary entries accessed with \[\[diary:2024-02-13\]\]
	[[diary:2024-02-13]]
- inside a wikilink, put #SYMBOL after the link source to jump to marker on opening file 
- link directly to things with raw URLS or \[\[file:filename\]\]
-
